divs: Sighting DetailsI was in bed, all of a sudden my bedroom lite up like a major size spot lite, I put my hand in front of my eyes to block the lite, a few seconds later it vanished. No noise. I didnt pay much attention to this until a few days later , outside my house ,I have a beautiful tree, the grass is fine,my shrubs are fine ,but the soil around the tree is very dry,and every leaf on the tree is burnt to a crisp,not one branch is broken .no burn marks the tree is perfectly shaped, but every single leaf is burnt. I picked up a leaf and crushed it in my hand, to dust.
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around August 8th 2009
